scripts.cpy:pre: cpy dist/PreQ20recovery-ofuscado/*.js dist/PreQ20recovery/ --flat && npm run clean:pre
scripts.cpy:pro: cpy dist/Q20recovery-ofuscado/*.js dist/Q20recovery/ --flat && npm run clean:pro
scripts.ofuscar:pre: javascript-obfuscator dist/PreQ20recovery --exclude dist/PreQ20recovery/assets --output dist/PreQ20recovery-ofuscado && npm run cpy:pre
scripts.build:prequipu: ng build --configuration pruebas --base-href=/PreQ20recovery/ --output-path=dist/PreQ20recovery && npm run ofuscar:pre
scripts.ofuscar:pro: javascript-obfuscator dist/Q20recovery --exclude dist/Q20recovery/assets --output dist/Q20recovery-ofuscado && npm run cpy:pro
